body: Eh, pretty boring. It was clear that the sisters were idiots for even accepting the deal in the first place. Not only that, but one week is not enough to completely brainwash someone like this. It honestly makes no sense. That, and what was the point of the netorare? I feel like nothing was added with it. Get rid of the kid and nothing about the story changes. Meh, this story is mediocre at best.
Oh dear, i know it’s a shota yet it’s still pretty heartbreaking
